ABOUT.label: About
ABOUT.title: Well Hello There
ABOUT.body:
Talk about yourself a little bit

You can use HTML in here. It is an alternative to loading a .js file for a section. Name it whatever you want by changing the label attribute in the main node above

See how the application attribute is empty? That is how the Site knows to use this HTML instead.

CODE.label: Code
CODE.title: Git Your Code Here
CODE.body:
You write great code, someone wants to talk to you!, this is how you make a link to another site section: Contact me

If you want to make a normal link, just make a normal link: Click Me

CONTACT.body: You can write a form directly into this area, or you can use/tweak the form submission micro-engine in the WorkshopContact.js file referenced in the application attribute above ^
